title: Magical X Miracle, Vol. 1
description: It's a tale of magic, mystery, and mistaken identity!Merleawe has just arrived in Viegald, where she hopes to study magic at one of the best schools in the kingdom. But shortly after she arrives, the Master Wizard Sylthfarn--the greatest magician of Viegaldâ€”goes missing. With panic setting in and a country in need, the followers of Sylthfarn discover that Merleawe looks remarkably like the Great Magician. With the right training and guidance, she just might pass as Sylthfarn. But is Merleawe "man" enough to bring peace to the kingdom?
author: Yuzu Mizutani
